title: Eagle in a Nest (Adler auf dem Nest III) and Fox with Young Eagle (Fuchs mit Adlerjungen) (in-text plates, page 18) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: Two from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (eagle, irreg.): 2 3/16 x 2 3/8" (5.6 x 6 cm); composition (fox, irreg.): 1 5/16 x 4 11/16" (3.3 x 11.9 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
